question: Is the Prostate- Specific Antigen (PSA) test relevant only for prostate cancer?
ideal_answer: No, although the PSA test can detect high levels of PSA that may indicate the presence of prostate cancer, many other conditions, such as an enlarged or inflamed prostate, can also increase PSA levels.
